name: repoint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put a new layer of mortar (= a mixture of sand, water, and cement) between bricks, etc. in a wall : We need to chip the original cement out and repoint the tiles. During the renovation the clock tower was cleaned and repointed.
More examplesFewer examplesThe front of the house needs repointing.The slate roof has been recently renewed and the stone work repointed.Workers have replaced leaking roofs, repointed brickwork, fixed toilets and replaced lighting.
